Julien Leclercq.title: Ganglands
Julien Leclercq.description: To protect his family from a powerful drug lord, skilled thief Mehdi and his expert team of robbers are pulled into a violent and deadly turf war.

Mike Flanagan.title: Midnight Mass
Mike Flanagan.description: The arrival of a charismatic young priest brings glorious miracles, ominous mysteries and renewed religious fervor to a dying town desperate to believe.

Andy Devonshire.title: The Great British Baking Show
Andy Devonshire.description: A talented batch of amateur bakers face off in a 10-week competition, whipping up their best dishes in the hopes of being named the U.K.'s best.

Kongkiat Komesiri.title: Bangkok Breaking
Kongkiat Komesiri.description: Struggling to earn a living in Bangkok, a man joins an emergency rescue service and realizes he must unravel a citywide conspiracy.

Olivier Megaton.title: Monsters Inside: The 24 Faces of Billy Milligan
Olivier Megaton.description: In the late 1970s, an accused serial rapist claims multiple personalities control his behavior, setting off a legal odyssey that captivates America.

Bunmi Ajakaiye.title: The Smart Money Woman
Bunmi Ajakaiye.description: Five glamorous millennials strive for success as they juggle careers, finances, love and friendships. Based on Arese Ugwu's 2016 best-selling novel.

Jason Hehir.title: Countdown: Inspiration4 Mission to Space
Jason Hehir.description: From training to launch to landing, this all-access docuseries rides along with the Inspiration4 crew on the first all-civilian orbital space mission.

Luis Alfaro, Javier G\u00f3mez Santander.title: Money Heist: From Tokyo to Berlin
Luis Alfaro, Javier G\u00f3mez Santander.description: The filmmakers and actors behind "Money Heist" characters like Tokyo and the Professor talk about the emotional artistic process of filming the series.

Gerhard Mostert.title: HQ Barbers
Gerhard Mostert.description: When a family run barber shop in the heart of Lagos is threatened by real estate developers, they'll do whatever it takes to stay in business.

Kemi Adetiba.title: King of Boys: The Return of the King
Kemi Adetiba.description: Alhaja Eniola Salami starts anew and sets her sights on a different position of power, fueled by revenge, regret and ruthlessness.

Brad Anderson.title: Clickbait
Brad Anderson.description: When family man Nick Brewer is abducted in a crime with a sinister online twist, those closest to him race to uncover who is behind it and why.

Mauricio Dias, Tatiana Villela.title: John of God: The Crimes of a Spiritual Healer
Mauricio Dias, Tatiana Villela.description: Idolized medium João Teixeira de Faria rises to international fame before horrifying abuse is revealed by survivors, prosecutors and the press.

Juan Carlos Medina.title: Gone for Good
Juan Carlos Medina.description: Ten years after losing two loved ones, a man is plunged into another dizzying mystery when his girlfriend vanishes. Based on a Harlan Coben novel.

Inma Torrente.title: Valeria
Inma Torrente.description: A writer in creative and marital crises finds support from three friends, who are also discovering themselves. Based on the novels by Elísabet Benavent.

Sakon Tiacharoen.title: I Need Romance
Sakon Tiacharoen.description: A workaholic who lost interest in romance reunites with an old flame and gifted music composer, who's determined to restore her belief in love.

Bejoy Nambiar, Priyadarshan, Karthik Nar.title: Navarasa
Bejoy Nambiar, Priyadarshan, Karthik Nar.description: From amusement to awe, the nine human emotions of Indian aesthetic theory are explored in this anthology series.

Billy Corben.title: Cocaine Cowboys: The Kings of Miami
Billy Corben.description: Two childhood friends go from high school dropouts to the most powerful drug kingpins in Miami in this true story of a crime saga that spanned decades.

Hsu Fu-chun.title: Office Girls
Hsu Fu-chun.description: A department store mogul has his son work incognito in a menial job to prove his worthiness, while female co-workers teach him how normal people live.

Hsu Fu-chun.title: The Rational Life
Hsu Fu-chun.description: A career-driven 30-something must contend with a cutthroat workplace, a love triangle and her nagging mom.

Glen Winter.title: The Flash
Glen Winter.description: A forensics expert who wakes from a coma with amazing new powers squares off against forces threatening the city in this live-action superhero romp.

Royale Watkins, Rich Schlansker.title: Plastic Cup Boyz: Laughing My Mask Off!
Royale Watkins, Rich Schlansker.description: Comedy collective The Plastic Cup Boyz pour out the punchlines in Atlanta during a trio of raw and lively stand-up specials.

Garrett Bradley.title: Naomi Osaka
Garrett Bradley.description: This intimate series follows Naomi Osaka as she explores her cultural roots and navigates her multifaceted identity as a tennis champ and rising leader.

Jan Holoubek.title: The Mire
Jan Holoubek.description: In an early-'80s Polish town, a prostitute and a youth leader are found killed, but the police's handling of the case makes two journalists suspicious.

Malik Nejer.title: Masameer County
Malik Nejer.description: A humorous view on a changing Saudi, this season includes stories about a global media war, a long-standing tribal feud and a health craze gone too far.

Sidharta Tata, Aco Tenriyagelli, Dian Sa.title: Quarantine Tales
Sidharta Tata, Aco Tenriyagelli, Dian Sa.description: Traversing genres, five separate stories offer unique, whimsical and thought-provoking takes on life during the pandemic in 2020.

Shen Leping.title: Legend of Exorcism
Shen Leping.description: After leaving Yaojin Palace, Kong Hongjun arrives in Chang'an to battle demons and forms a bond with exorcism squad chief Li Jinglong.

John Dower.title: Sophie: A Murder in West Cork
John Dower.description: A shocking murder in rural Ireland sets off an increasingly convoluted quest for justice that spans decades and cuts across national borders.

Srijit Mukherji, Vasan Bala, Abhishek Ch.title: Ray
Srijit Mukherji, Vasan Bala, Abhishek Ch.description: From a satire to a psychological thriller, four short stories from celebrated auteur and writer Satyajit Ray are adapted for the screen in this series.

Fernando Moro.title: Cleo & Cuquin
Fernando Moro.description: Spirited sister-brother duo Cleo and Cuquín try on different professions each day to help their other siblings solve problems and enjoy new adventures.

Ivan Andrew Payawal.title: Gameboys Level-Up Edition
Ivan Andrew Payawal.description: In this recut of the popular web series, live-stream gamer Cairo calls for a rematch after losing to newcomer Gavreel — and an online romance blooms.

Rob Seidenglanz.title: Riverdale
Rob Seidenglanz.description: While navigating the troubled waters of sex, romance, school and family, teen Archie and his gang become entangled in a dark Riverdale mystery.

Rob Seidenglanz.title: DC's Legends of Tomorrow
Rob Seidenglanz.description: A mysterious "time master" from the future unites an unlikely group of superheroes and villains to save the world from a powerful evil.

Simon Frederick.title: They've Gotta Have Us
Simon Frederick.description: Powered by candid recollections from esteemed African-American entertainers, this docuseries traces the history of black cinema.

Sarawut Wichiensarn.title: Let's Eat
Sarawut Wichiensarn.description: A food-blogging insurance agent encounters a friend from elementary school with a vendetta against him — but soon becomes her sidekick.

Michael Simon.title: The American Bible Challenge
Michael Simon.description: Join host Jeff Foxworthy as contestants test their knowledge of all things biblical, competing to win money for the charities of their choice.

Joe Berlinger, Bruce Sinofsky.title: Metallica: Some Kind of Monster
Joe Berlinger, Bruce Sinofsky.description: This collection includes the acclaimed rock documentary about Metallica, plus a film checking in with the still-thriving group 10 years later.

Jay Oliva.title: Trese
Jay Oliva.description: In Manila, where dark supernatural forces pervade the criminal underworld, it’s up to Alexandra Trese to keep the peace — but there’s a storm brewing.

Ally Pankiw.title: Feel Good
Ally Pankiw.description: Stand-up comic Mae Martin navigates a passionate, messy new relationship with her girlfriend, George, while dealing with the challenges of sobriety.

Chiaki Kon.title: Pretty Guardian Sailor Moon Eternal The Movie
Chiaki Kon.description: When a dark power enshrouds the Earth after a total solar eclipse, the scattered Sailor Guardians must reunite to bring light back into the world.

Takuya Igarashi.title: Ouran High School Host Club
Takuya Igarashi.description: New student Haruhi stumbles on the Ouran High School Host Club, an all-male group that makes money by entertaining the girls of the school.

Jos\u00e9 Larraza, Marc Pons.title: The Least Expected Day: Inside the Movistar Team 2019
Jos\u00e9 Larraza, Marc Pons.description: Pro cycling’s Movistar Team sets their sights on victory while on the road as they face challenges, controversy and internal conflict.

Gary Sing.title: Word of Honor
Gary Sing.description: A disillusioned royal magistrate sets out for the martial arts world, where he encounters a bosom friend and becomes entangled in a conspiracy.

Daniel Minahan.title: Halston
Daniel Minahan.description: His name built an empire. His style defined an era. American fashion designer Halston skyrockets to fame before his life starts to spin out of control.

Uzodinma Okpechi.title: The Mystic River
Uzodinma Okpechi.description: As pregnant women vanish in a remote Nigerian village over decades, a doctor with child finds herself extremely close to uncovering dangerous secrets.

Cai Cong.title: Use For My Talent
Cai Cong.description: When the germophobic owner of a cleaning company encounters a slovenly employee, a romance blossoms as they help one another heal from their pasts.

Vijay Roche.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai
Vijay Roche.description: In this madcap comedy, two mischievous cats, a talking parrot and a high-strung dog keep getting into trouble while their human is away.

Joshua Zeman.title: The Sons of Sam: A Descent into Darkness
Joshua Zeman.description: The Son of Sam case grew into a lifelong obsession for journalist Maury Terry, who became convinced that the murders were linked to a satanic cult.

Oriol Paulo.title: The Innocent
Oriol Paulo.description: An accidental killing leads a man down a dark hole of intrigue and murder. Just as he finds love and freedom, one phone call brings back the nightmare.

Kongkiat Khomsiri.title: Let's Fight Ghost
Kongkiat Khomsiri.description: A med student with a supernatural gift tries to cash in on his abilities by facing off against ghosts, till a wandering spirit brings romance instead.

Glenn Weiss.title: Garth Brooks: The Road I’m On
Glenn Weiss.description: Revealing interviews and archive footage tell the story of Garth Brooks' humble beginnings, rise to fame and unprecedented impact on country music.

Pass Patthanakumjon.title: The Underclass
Pass Patthanakumjon.description: After getting dropped from an elite program, a student gets tangled in the affairs of a high school gang while trying to find her own identity.

Moyoung Jin, Caroline S\u00e1, Deepti Ka.title: My Love: Six Stories of True Love
Moyoung Jin, Caroline S\u00e1, Deepti Ka.description: Six longtime couples in different parts of the world share their decades-long love in these tender portraits filmed over the course of one year.

Adri\u00e1n Garc\u00eda Bogliano.title: Haunted: Latin America
Adri\u00e1n Garc\u00eda Bogliano.description: Real people's terrifying tales of the chilling, unexplained and paranormal come to life with dramatic reenactments in this reality series.

Jung-ah Im.title: Men on a Mission
Jung-ah Im.description: Male celebs play make-believe as high schoolers, welcoming star transfer students every week and engaging in battles of witty humor and slapstick.

Alain Brunard.title: Under Suspicion: Uncovering the Wesphael Case
Alain Brunard.description: This docuseries follows the high-profile case of Belgian politician Bernard Wesphael, who was accused of murdering his wife in 2013.

Ange Basterga, Nicolas Lopez.title: Dealer
Ange Basterga, Nicolas Lopez.description: Tensions erupt when two filmmakers infiltrate an area ruled by gangs to shoot a music video for a rapper in this gritty found-footage series.

Maribel S\u00e1nchez-Maroto.title: Nevenka: Breaking the Silence
Maribel S\u00e1nchez-Maroto.description: Nevenka Fernández, the plaintiff in Spain's first successful lawsuit against a politician for sexual harassment, breaks her silence after 20 years.

Jared Hess, Tyler Measom.title: Murder Among the Mormons
Jared Hess, Tyler Measom.description: High-stakes exploits turn deadly — and shake a global church to its core — in this extraordinary true crime story.

Sunny Lau.title: A Perfect Day For Arsenide
Sunny Lau.description: An eclectic group of people encounters zany situations in this anthology of surreal, offbeat tales from Hong Kong. Based on Mr. Pizza's hit novel.

Tharun Bhascker Dhaassyam, B. V. Nandini.title: Pitta Kathalu
Tharun Bhascker Dhaassyam, B. V. Nandini.description: From secrets and lies to jealousy and control, four stories in this anthology film explore the darker, deceptive sides of love.

Joe Berlinger.title: Crime Scene: The Vanishing at the Cecil Hotel
Joe Berlinger.description: The notorious Cecil Hotel grows in infamy when guest Elisa Lam vanishes. From the creator of "The Ted Bundy Tapes," a dive into crime's darkest places.

Richard Arellano.title: The House Arrest of Us
Richard Arellano.description: A couple decides to make their engagement official by honoring tradition when a pandemic forces them and their families to quarantine under one roof.

Tiller Russell.title: Night Stalker: The Hunt for a Serial Killer
Tiller Russell.description: Beneath the sunlit glamour of 1985 LA lurks a relentlessly evil serial killer. In this true-crime story, two detectives won't rest until they catch him.

Juliet May.title: Last Tango in Halifax
Juliet May.description: Two widowed childhood sweethearts fall for each other all over again when they are reunited over the Internet after nearly 60 years.

Maite Ruiz De Austri.title: The Idhun Chronicles
Maite Ruiz De Austri.description: A boy suddenly orphaned fights his parents' killer to save a planet, and discovers a new world of danger — and wonder.

Tony Collingwood.title: The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That!
Tony Collingwood.description: The Cat in the Hat is back – and this time, he's teaching Sally and her brother, Nick, some awfully nifty things to think about!

Cosima Spender.title: SanPa: Sins of the Savior
Cosima Spender.description: Amidst a heroin crisis, Vincenzo Muccioli cared for the addicted, earning him fierce public devotion — even as charges of violence began to mount.

Sudha Kongara, Vignesh Shivan, Gautham V.title: Paava Kadhaigal
Sudha Kongara, Vignesh Shivan, Gautham V.description: At times dark, at times disturbing, four short films explore stories of those who dare to dream and desire — and those determined to stand in their way.

Alexx Media.title: Schulz Saves America
Alexx Media.description: Comedian Andrew Schulz takes on the year's most divisive topics in this fearlessly unfiltered and irreverent four-part special.

Andrucha Waddington, Pedro Waddington.title: Anitta: Made In Honório
Andrucha Waddington, Pedro Waddington.description: In this intimate documentary, Brazilian pop queen Anitta opens up about fame, family and her fierce work ethic, revealing the woman behind the hits.

Picky Talarico.title: BREAK IT ALL: The History of Rock in Latin America
Picky Talarico.description: Soda Stereo, Café Tacvba, Aterciopelados and others figure in this 50-year history of Latin American rock through dictatorships, disasters and dissent.

Ellena Wood, Jesse Vile.title: The Ripper
Ellena Wood, Jesse Vile.description: In the late 1970s, British police struggle to identify — let alone capture — the serial killer known throughout the world as the Yorkshire Ripper.

Lai Chun-yu.title: Futmalls.com
Lai Chun-yu.description: Strange occurrences afflict a group of people after they purchase items on a shopping website from the future.

Jalil Lespert.title: Room 2806: The Accusation
Jalil Lespert.description: This docuseries follows the 2011 sexual assault case involving French politician Dominique Strauss-Kahn at the height of his career.

Su I-Hsuan, Chuang Shiang-an, Liu Yi.title: Detention
Su I-Hsuan, Chuang Shiang-an, Liu Yi.description: A tormented student uncovers unsettling secrets at her remote high school as betrayal and a paranormal encounter upend her life.

BB Sasore.title: Before 30
BB Sasore.description: Four female friends in the fast-paced city of Lagos, Nigeria endure public and private pressures to walk down the aisle by the age of 30.

Mateo Gil.title: The Minions of Midas
Mateo Gil.description: A millionaire publisher gets a blackmail note — his decision can mean life or death. Inspired by a Jack London story but set in contemporary Madrid.

Carla Barros.title: A Queen Is Born
Carla Barros.description: Gloria Groove and Alexia Twister make drag dreams come true as they help six artists find the confidence to own the stage in this makeover show.

Steven Bognar, Julia Reichert.title: A Lion in the House
Steven Bognar, Julia Reichert.description: Five kids and their resilient families navigate the treatments and traumas of pediatric cancer in this documentary filmed over the course of six years.

Alejandro Hartmann.title: Carmel: Who Killed Maria Marta?
Alejandro Hartmann.description: A woman is found dead in her bathtub, with a puddle of blood nearby. Her husband theorizes she had an accident. But an autopsy tells a different story.

Juliana Vicente.title: Afronta! Facing It!
Juliana Vicente.description: This docuseries spotlights Afro-Brazilian thinkers sharing their individual journeys and discussing representation, entrepreneurship and community.

Chang Chin-jung, Chen Rong-hui.title: The Devil Punisher
Chang Chin-jung, Chen Rong-hui.description: A baker by day and demon fighter by night, a reincarnated deity must jog his amnesiac lover's memory of their millennium-long romance.

Thierry Demaizi\u00e8re, Alban Teurlai.title: Move
Thierry Demaizi\u00e8re, Alban Teurlai.description: Discover the brilliant dancers and choreographers who are shaping the art of movement around the world in this documentary series.

Manolo Caro.title: Someone Has to Die
Manolo Caro.description: In conservative 1950s Spain, the alleged relationship between a young man and a Mexican ballerino creates an uproar of harrowing consequences.

Pavel Kostomarov.title: To the Lake
Pavel Kostomarov.description: Facing the end of civilization when a terrifying plague strikes, a group risks their lives, loves — and humanity — in a brutal struggle to survive.

Philippa Lowthorpe.title: Call the Midwife
Philippa Lowthorpe.description: This period drama set in impoverished East London in the 1950s follows a newly qualified midwife and her colleagues at a nursing convent.

Kenny Ortega.title: Julie and the Phantoms
Kenny Ortega.description: Julie lost her passion for music when she lost her mom. But when three ghostly guys appear and lift her spirits, they decide to start a band together!

Pepe Mora.title: La Línea: Shadow of Narco
Pepe Mora.description: A stone's throw from Africa, the Spanish beach town of La Línea is a drug smuggling hot spot. But the police and mayor are determined to change that.

Greg Tiernan.title: Thomas and Friends
Greg Tiernan.description: This animated children's series follows the adventures of Thomas, a cheerful blue tank engine who lives on the island of Sodor.

Hong Won-ki.title: Goedam
Hong Won-ki.description: When night falls on the city, shadows and spirits come alive in this horror anthology series centered on urban legends.

Nopparoj Chotmunkongsit.title: Unlucky Ploy
Nopparoj Chotmunkongsit.description: In this remake of the Korean series, a man becomes mired in the lives of two women who happen to share the same name.

Alex Gibney.title: Sinatra: All or Nothing at All
Alex Gibney.description: Legendary crooner Frank Sinatra's life and talent are captured in this documentary series featuring fond memories from friends, family and colleagues.

Cassia Dian.title: Dating Around: Brazil
Cassia Dian.description: In this reality show, six singles meet five different blind dates at trendy urban hot spots in Brazil. Who will they choose for a second outing?

Wouter Bouvijn.title: The Twelve
Wouter Bouvijn.description: Twelve jurors — ordinary people with struggles of their own — must decide the case of a woman accused of killing her best friend and her own daughter.

Rachit Kusonkoonsiri.title: Hook
Rachit Kusonkoonsiri.description: Despite their fathers' rivalry, two university students form a friendship at a boxing gym as they tackle family drama, romance and personal crises.

Kyran Kelly.title: Abby Hatcher
Kyran Kelly.description: A big-hearted girl helps her Fuzzly friends who live in her family's hotel with exploring feelings, fixing mishaps and embracing their special quirks.

Phil Sgriccia.title: Supernatural
Phil Sgriccia.description: Siblings Dean and Sam crisscross the country, investigating paranormal activity and picking fights with demons, ghosts and monsters.

Jesse Warn.title: Supergirl
Jesse Warn.description: To avert a disaster, Kara Danvers reveals her powers and true identity: She is Superman's cousin, now known as Supergirl, protector of National City.

Norm Hiscock, Gary Howsam, Mike Smith, J.title: Trailer Park Boys: The Animated Series
Norm Hiscock, Gary Howsam, Mike Smith, J.description: Nova Scotia’s favorite miscreants have always been super sketchy. Now, carrying on from the Season 12 finale, the boys have become complete cartoons.

Marcus Raboy.title: Patton Oswalt: I Love Everything
Marcus Raboy.description: Turning 50. Finding love again. Buying a house. Experiencing existential dread at Denny's. Life comes at Patton Oswalt fast in this stand-up special.

Ziad Doueiri.title: Inhuman Resources
Ziad Doueiri.description: Alain Delambre, unemployed and 57, is lured by an attractive job opening. But things get ugly when he realizes he’s a pawn in a cruel corporate game.

Sivaroj Kongsakul.title: Sleepless Society: Two Pillows & A Lost Soul
Sivaroj Kongsakul.description: A motivational speaker about to divorce her abusive husband wakes up from a wild party one morning to find a dead body.

Damien Chazelle, Houda Benyamina, La\u00.title: The Eddy
Damien Chazelle, Houda Benyamina, La\u00.description: The owner of a Paris jazz club gets tangled up with dangerous criminals as he fights to protect his business, his band and his teenage daughter.

He Xiaofeng.title: Scissor Seven
He Xiaofeng.description: Seeking to recover his memory, a scissor-wielding, hairdressing, bungling quasi-assassin stumbles into a struggle for power among feuding factions.

Hern\u00e1n Guerschuny.title: Almost Happy
Hern\u00e1n Guerschuny.description: Sebastián is a radio show host of modest fame, trying to find a way in the world as he deals with his ex-wife (whom he still loves) and two kids.

Sion Sono.title: The Forest of Love: Deep Cut
Sion Sono.description: Nothing's as it seems when a charismatic conman and an aspiring film crew delve into the lives of two emotionally scarred women.

David Chuang, Chen Kuan-chung.title: The Victims' Game
David Chuang, Chen Kuan-chung.description: After discovering his estranged daughter's link to mysterious murders, a forensic detective with Asperger's syndrome risks everything to solve the case.

Ryan Polito.title: Middleditch & Schwartz
Ryan Polito.description: Comedy duo Thomas Middleditch and Ben Schwartz turn small ideas into epically funny stories in this series of completely improvised comedy specials.

Adrien Lagier, Ousmane Ly.title: Fary : Hexagone
Adrien Lagier, Ousmane Ly.description: French comedy phenom Fary puts a playful spin on questions of identity, culture and more in the first half of an epic two-part stand-up special.

Stefano Lodovichi.title: The Trial
Stefano Lodovichi.description: The murder of a teen girl impacts a public prosecutor linked to the victim, a lawyer seeking a career-making case and a suspect who says she's innocent.

Vijay S. Bhanushali.title: Bal Ganesh
Vijay S. Bhanushali.description: Watch Ganesh destroy demons, disarm invaders and defeat dacoits in this series based on the mythological Hindu elephant god’s childhood.

Eric Goode, Rebecca Chaiklin.title: Tiger King: Murder, Mayhem and Madness
Eric Goode, Rebecca Chaiklin.description: A zoo owner spirals out of control amid a cast of eccentric characters in this true murder-for-hire story from the underworld of big cat breeding.

Lynn Novick.title: Ken Burns Presents: College Behind Bars: A Film by Lynn Novick and Produced by Sarah Botstein
Lynn Novick.description: This docuseries follows several incarcerated people as they pursue a college degree through the Bard Prison Initiative, a rigorous education program.

Kim Seong-hun.title: Kingdom
Kim Seong-hun.description: While strange rumors about their ill king grip a kingdom, the crown prince becomes their only hope against a mysterious plague overtaking the land.

Carlos Sedes.title: Velvet
Carlos Sedes.description: In 1950s Spain, the heir to a fashion house romances a beautiful seamstress who works for the company, despite the objections of his family.

Ali Kalthami, Meshal Aljaser, Faris Godu.title: Six Windows in the Desert
Ali Kalthami, Meshal Aljaser, Faris Godu.description: From a theatre play to the aftermath of a plane crash, this collection of shorts from Saudi filmmakers depicts the nuances of Saudi Arabian culture.

Mick Grogan.title: Unabomber - In His Own Words
Mick Grogan.description: The CIA attempts to turn Ted Kaczynski, aka the Unabomber, into a super agent — a plan that backfires. Based on real events.

Tosin Coker.title: On the Real
Tosin Coker.description: A group of reality stars transitions into their newly achieved fame while dealing with the demands of an obnoxious TV executive and their regular lives.

Pantham Thongsang, Cheewatan Pusitsuksa.title: Sleepless Society: Insomnia
Pantham Thongsang, Cheewatan Pusitsuksa.description: Haunted by recurring visions, a young woman with insomnia visits an old home to solve a mystery and put her nightmares to an end.

James Bamford.title: Arrow
James Bamford.description: Based on DC Comics' Green Arrow, an affluent playboy becomes a vengeful superhero, saving the city from villains armed with just a bow and arrows.

Julia Willoughby Nason, Jenner Furst.title: The Pharmacist
Julia Willoughby Nason, Jenner Furst.description: After his son's tragic death, a Louisiana pharmacist goes to extremes to expose the rampant corruption behind the opioid addiction crisis.

Thomas Astruc.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir
Thomas Astruc.description: When Paris is in peril, Marinette becomes Ladybug. Little does she know, her school crush Adrien is actually Cat Noir, another city-saving superhero.

Quek Shio-chuan.title: The Ghost Bride
Quek Shio-chuan.description: In 1890s Malacca, Li Lan finds herself in the afterlife and becomes mired in a mystery linked to the sinister, deceased son of a wealthy family.

Soumendra Padhi.title: Jamtara - Sabka Number Ayega
Soumendra Padhi.description: A group of small-town young men run a lucrative phishing operation, until a corrupt politician wants in on their scheme – and a cop wants to fight it.

Justin Webster.title: Nisman: The Prosecutor, the President, and the Spy
Justin Webster.description: This docuseries details the suspicious death of Alberto Nisman, investigator of the 1994 bombing of the Argentine Israelite Mutual Association building.

Lee Toland Krieger.title: You
Lee Toland Krieger.description: Obsessed with an aspiring writer, a charming bookstore manager goes to extreme measures to insert himself into her life.

Mark Lewis.title: Don't F**k with Cats: Hunting an Internet Killer
Mark Lewis.description: A twisted criminal's gruesome videos drive a group of amateur online sleuths to launch a risky manhunt that pulls them into a dark underworld.

Obi Emelonye.title: Crazy, Lovely, Cool
Obi Emelonye.description: For a group of charismatic undergraduates, the jolting revelations from a campus blog turn surviving university life into a serious matter.

Tsutomu Mizushima.title: Girls und Panzer
Tsutomu Mizushima.description: Miho Nishizumi tries to escape her family's tradition of tankery by enrolling at a new high school. Instead she gets back into the sport with friends.

Michel Tikhomiroff.title: The Chosen One
Michel Tikhomiroff.description: Determined to bring a Zika vaccine to the remote Pantanal, three doctors clash with a faith healer and are pulled deeper into the mysteries of his cult.

Robert Kenner, Taki Oldham.title: The Confession Killer
Robert Kenner, Taki Oldham.description: Henry Lee Lucas rose to infamy when he confessed to hundreds of unsolved murders. This docuseries examines the truth – and horrifying consequences.

DJ Chen.title: Nowhere Man
DJ Chen.description: Two nefarious schemes taking place 10 years apart entangle a dauntless triad member, who must break out of prison to rescue a loved one.

Park Joon-hwa.title: Bring It On, Ghost
Park Joon-hwa.description: A college student with psychic abilities takes in an amnesiac ghost as his roommate – who ends up helping him hunt down spooky spirits.

Ahmet Kat\u0131ks\u0131z.title: Black Money Love
Ahmet Kat\u0131ks\u0131z.description: After a cop's fiancée and a jewelry designer's father are found dead together, the two bereaved ones face a perilous aftermath of a theft gone wrong.

Lee Yoon-jung.title: Cheese in the Trap
Lee Yoon-jung.description: In this adaptation of a popular webtoon, a poor student trying to navigate college life gains the attention of a wealthy upperclassman with a dark side.

Danny Cannon.title: Gotham
Danny Cannon.description: Long before he was commissioner, rookie cop James Gordon takes on Gotham City crime and corruption to avenge the murder of Bruce Wayne's parents.

Mariano Barroso.title: Criminal: Spain
Mariano Barroso.description: Psychological games abound between detectives and suspects in a tense interrogation room, where the search for answers sometimes comes at a moral cost.

Kiko Cruz Claverol, Patricia Font.title: The Hockey Girls
Kiko Cruz Claverol, Patricia Font.description: The passionate members of a girls' roller hockey team chase down victories in the rink while striving to make time for school, family and romance.

Hayato Date.title: Naruto
Hayato Date.description: Guided by the spirit demon within him, orphaned Naruto learns to harness his powers as a ninja in this anime adventure series.

Vikramaditya Motwane, Anurag Kashyap.title: Sacred Games
Vikramaditya Motwane, Anurag Kashyap.description: A link in their pasts leads an honest cop to a fugitive gang boss, whose cryptic warning spurs the officer on a quest to save Mumbai from cataclysm.

Cho Li, Chen Hung-yi, Weica Wang, Liu Ba.title: Til Death Do Us Part
Cho Li, Chen Hung-yi, Weica Wang, Liu Ba.description: Based on the speculative short stories of MirrorFiction, this sci-fi thriller anthology plunges headlong into our deepest desires – and darkest fears.

Jesse Moss.title: The Family
Jesse Moss.description: An enigmatic conservative Christian group known as the Family wields enormous influence in Washington, D.C., in pursuit of its global ambitions.

Shin Won-ho.title: Reply 1994
Shin Won-ho.description: All hailing from various parts of Korea, a group of college students go from being complete strangers to a big happy family at a Seoul boarding house.

Shin Won-ho.title: Reply 1997
Shin Won-ho.description: As a teen, Shi Won was obsessed with a boy band. Now 33 years old, Shi Won and her friends are reviving their memories as their school reunion nears.

Jerry Seinfeld.title: Comedians in Cars Getting Coffee
Jerry Seinfeld.description: Jerry Seinfeld's roving talk show combines coffee, laughs and vintage cars into quirky, caffeine-fueled adventures with the sharpest minds in comedy.

Luis Alberto Restrepo, Andr\u00e9s Beltr.title: Bolívar
Luis Alberto Restrepo, Andr\u00e9s Beltr.description: This dramatization depicts the life – and loves – of Venezuelan Gen. Simón Bolívar, who helped liberate several Latin American countries from Spain.

El\u00edas Le\u00f3n.title: The Alcàsser Murders
El\u00edas Le\u00f3n.description: New interviews and an up-to-date analysis of evidence shed light on the 1992 murders of three girls in Spain and their profound impact on the nation.

Diego Enrique Osorno.description: Archival video and new interviews examine Mexican politics in 1994, a year marked by the rise of the EZLN and the assassination of Luis Donaldo Colosio.

Felipe Cano.title: Crime Diaries: Night Out
Felipe Cano.description: After going to a Halloween party, college student Luis Andrés Colmenares is found dead. Was it an accident or murder? Inspired by true events.

Quentin Tarantino.title: The Hateful Eight: Extended Version
Quentin Tarantino.description: Trapped at a stagecoach stop as a storm rages outside, two bounty hunters and an outlaw face a gallery of rogues. Features never-before-seen footage.

Lee Kyoungmi, Yim Pilsung, Jeon Go-woon,.title: Persona
Lee Kyoungmi, Yim Pilsung, Jeon Go-woon,.description: An exploration of different personas in an eclectic collection of four works by critically acclaimed Korean directors.

Lars Kaalund.title: Hjørdis
Lars Kaalund.description: This miniseries spinoff of "Rita" follows teacher Hjørdis as she plans a school play on bullying featuring a cast of socially awkward students.

Seren Y\u00fcce.title: Innocent
Seren Y\u00fcce.description: In a peaceful, rustic town, a retired officer and his family are mired in a murder mystery riddled with shocking, buried secrets.

Noam Murro.title: Watership Down
Noam Murro.description: A warren of rabbits battles many threats on their daring journey to find a new home in this adaptation of the classic novel by Richard Adams.

Joel Gallen, Tig Notaro.title: Ellen DeGeneres: Relatable
Joel Gallen, Tig Notaro.description: In her first special since 2003, Ellen revisits her road to stardom and details the heartfelt – and hilarious – lessons she's learned along the way.

Mat King.title: Pine Gap
Mat King.description: At top-secret U.S.-Australian joint defense facility Pine Gap, fissures appear in the critical alliance as spies work with, and against, each other.

Padraic McKinley.title: FIGHTWORLD
Padraic McKinley.description: Actor and fight enthusiast Frank Grillo travels the world, immersing himself in different fight cultures to understand their traditions and motivations.

Peter Ho.title: Age of Rebellion
Peter Ho.description: At their high school, a group of unruly teens wreak havoc, face bullies and navigate turbulent lives beyond school grounds.

Patrick Graham.title: GHOUL
Patrick Graham.description: When a new prisoner at a military detention center exhibits eerie behavior, a young interrogator’s search for the truth becomes a battle for survival.

Han Qing.title: Take My Brother Away
Han Qing.description: Bickering siblings Shi Miao and Shi Fen tackle friendship matters, school drama and the pitfalls of growing up with little parental supervision.

Lee Eung-bok.title: Mr. Sunshine
Lee Eung-bok.description: A young boy who ends up in the U.S. after the 1871 Shinmiyangyo incident returns to Korea at a historical turning point and falls for a noblewoman.

Trey Borzillieri, Barbara Schroeder.title: Evil Genius
Trey Borzillieri, Barbara Schroeder.description: This baffling true crime story starts with the grisly death of a pizza man who robs a bank with a bomb around his neck – and gets weirder from there.

Dawn Porter.title: Bobby Kennedy for President
Dawn Porter.description: Historic footage and leading voices of the era examine the "Bobby Phenomenon" of the 1960s and the legacy of the man who helped redefine the country.

Dan Lucchesi.title: James Acaster: Repertoire
Dan Lucchesi.description: Offbeat comic James Acaster covers the strange, the mundane and everything in between in this collection of four wide-ranging stand-up specials.

Kazuya Murata.title: A.I.C.O.
Kazuya Murata.description: Everything Aiko knew was a lie. Now she's joining a team of Divers to reach the place where the Burst began to stop it for good and save her family.

Dan Forrer.title: Under Arrest
Dan Forrer.description: Cameras follow police officers as they solve crimes, assist the public and arrest lawbreakers in this reality series.

Kobun Shizuno, Hiroyuki Seshita.title: Godzilla
Kobun Shizuno, Hiroyuki Seshita.description: A desperate group of refugees attempts to recolonize Earth 20,000 years after Godzilla took over. But one young man wants revenge above all else.

Masaaki Yuasa.title: Devilman Crybaby
Masaaki Yuasa.description: With demons reawakened and humanity in turmoil, a sensitive demon-boy is led into a brutal, degenerate war against evil by his mysterious friend, Ryo.

Yasuhiro Irie.title: Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood
Yasuhiro Irie.description: After both suffer physical damage – brothers Edward and Alphonse battle nefarious forces to try to reclaim their bodies in this supernatural anime.

Stan Lathan.title: Dave Chappelle: Equanimity & The Bird Revelation
Stan Lathan.description: Comedy titan Dave Chappelle caps a wild year with two stand-up specials packed with scorching new material, self-reflection and tough love.

Stan Lathan.title: Dave Chappelle
Stan Lathan.description: Comedy icon Dave Chappelle makes his triumphant return to the screen with a pair of blistering, fresh stand-up specials.

Daniel Kontur.title: Myths & Monsters
Daniel Kontur.description: This documentary series takes us to the mythic landscapes of Europe to explore some of most enduring legends produced by European culture.

Olivier Jean-Marie.title: Oggy and the Cockroaches
Olivier Jean-Marie.description: Wimpy blue cat Oggy would like nothing more than to snooze, but he's constantly bothered by the three ugly cockroaches who have invaded his home.

David Ayer.title: Bright: The Music Videos
David Ayer.description: Explore the hit songs from the Will Smith film "Bright" in these music videos from Machine Gun Kelly, Bastille, Logic, Migos and friends.

Go Koga.title: Glitter Force Doki Doki
Go Koga.description: Four girls summon their inner superheroes to defend Earth and the magical kingdom of Splendorius from King Mercenare and his minions.

Pali Yahya.title: Akulah Balqis
Pali Yahya.description: A little girl must enter an orphanage after her parents are arrested, but her life takes a dramatic turn when she escapes and meets a model.

Vanessa Roth.title: Daughters of Destiny
Vanessa Roth.description: Five girls from India's most impoverished families attend a boarding school designed to create opportunities as they strive for a brighter future.

Eric Abrams.title: Ari Shaffir: Double Negative
Eric Abrams.description: Wry yet thoughtful, comedian Ari Shaffir brings his edgy humor to two fast-paced stand-up specials about children and adulthood.

Stefan Brogren.title: Degrassi: Next Class
Stefan Brogren.description: Degrassi's next generation of high-tech newbies and returning students navigates real-world high school drama. If you're a teen, this is your life.

Serdar Akar.description: A genetics professor experiments with a treatment for his comatose sister that blends medical and shamanic cures, but unlocks a shocking side effect.

Iginio Straffi.title: World of Winx
Iginio Straffi.description: The reality show "WOW!" engages the Winx in their mission, starting an undercover, worldly journey in order to make talented kids' dreams come true.

Iginio Straffi.title: Maggie & Bianca: Fashion Friends
Iginio Straffi.description: Originally polar opposites, an American fashion student and the daughter of an industry mogul form an everlasting bond and start a rock band in Milan.

Chang-Min Lee.title: Man to Man
Chang-Min Lee.description: Disguised as a bodyguard, a special agent must complete his national secret tasks while pandering to the whims of his ill-tempered world star.

Jill Bauer, Ronna Gradus, Rashida Jones.title: Hot Girls Wanted: Turned On
Jill Bauer, Ronna Gradus, Rashida Jones.description: Personal stories reveal how the intersection of sex, technology and intimate relationships is rewiring us in fundamental ways.

Laurent Bouzereau.title: Five Came Back
Laurent Bouzereau.description: Five acclaimed contemporary directors tell the story of five legendary Hollywood filmmakers who enlisted in the armed forces to document World War II.

Gordon Anderson.title: Hoff the Record
Gordon Anderson.description: TV star David Hasselhoff hopes to reboot his career in the U.K., but both his comeback plans and his personal life keep going off the rails.

James Hawes.title: Merlin
James Hawes.description: This family-oriented retelling of the King Arthur legend finds Merlin arriving in Camelot, where he hones his magic skills with the help of his uncle.

David Schalko.title: Old Money
David Schalko.description: Backstabbing, blackmail and revenge consume the dysfunctional family of a wealthy patriarch as they compete to find him a new liver at all costs.

Tensai Okamura.title: Kuromukuro
Tensai Okamura.description: When mecha attack a research center, its students, pilots, and researchers must fight back with the help of mysterious artifacts and a young samurai.

Eli Roth.title: Hemlock Grove
Eli Roth.description: Secrets are just a part of daily life in the small Pennsylvania town of Hemlock Grove, where the darkest evils hide in plain sight.

Nizar Shafi.title: 7 (Seven)
Nizar Shafi.description: Multiple women report their husbands as missing but when it appears they are looking for the same man, a police officer traces their cryptic connection.

Jung-ah Im, Seung-uk Jo.title: Abnormal Summit
Jung-ah Im, Seung-uk Jo.description: Led by a trio of Korean celebs, a multinational panel of men engage in – usually – lighthearted debates on issues that surround Korea and beyond.

Sharon Grimberg.title: American Experience: The Circus
Sharon Grimberg.description: An exploration of the American circus, as the spectacle evolved from a one-ring show to a cultural event and eventually, a dying breed.

Miguel Conde.title: Bitter Daisies
Miguel Conde.description: While investigating the disappearance of a teen girl in a tight-knit Galician town, a Civil Guard officer uncovers secrets linked to a loss of her own.

Cecilia Peck.title: Brave Miss World
Cecilia Peck.description: Weeks before being named Miss World, Linor Abargil was raped. She tells the world her inspiring true story in this Emmy-nominated documentary.

Carlos Bolado.title: Camelia la Texana
Carlos Bolado.description: Inspired by the famous song "Contrabando y Traición," Camelia, a beautiful girl from San Antonio, kills her lover and becomes a legendary drug runner.

James Lee.title: Exclusive Edition
James Lee.description: Young journalists working for a magazine juggle careers, romance and other challenges while reporting on social issues and news stories in Malaysia.

Ian Barber.title: Father Brown
Ian Barber.description: A modest, compassionate priest doubles as an effective crime solver in this series based on the short stories by G.K. Chesterton.

Alastair Fothergill.title: Frozen Planet
Alastair Fothergill.description: Go on a journey through the Arctic and Antarctic with this visually stunning program that explores these wildernesses and their inhabitants.

Alastair Fothergill.title: Planet Earth: The Complete Collection
Alastair Fothergill.description: This landmark series transports nature lovers from the Himalayan Mountains to the depths of the ocean and everywhere in between.

Alastair Fothergill.title: The Blue Planet: A Natural History of the Oceans
Alastair Fothergill.description: David Attenborough narrates this definitive exploration of the marine world, from the familiar to the unknown, revealing the sea and its communities.

Guy Vasilovich.title: Geronimo Stilton
Guy Vasilovich.description: With the help of brainy and adventurous sidekicks, New Mouse City's favorite journalist investigates mysteries that take him around the world,

Neslihan Yesilyurt.title: Gonul
Neslihan Yesilyurt.description: A nurse escapes from her surgeon fiancé after his ex reveals his dark secrets. She later finds love again, but a car accident changes everything.

Ah Loong.title: Harry & Bunnie
Ah Loong.description: A young wannabe magician and his mischievous stage rabbit battle and sabotage each other while putting on shows.

Stuart Orme.title: Jack Taylor
Stuart Orme.description: Ken Bruen's bestselling crime novels leap to life in this series of TV movies featuring Irish cop-turned-private-investigator Jack Taylor.

Toby Haynes.title: Jonathan Strange & Mr Norrell
Toby Haynes.description: In 1806, ambitious magician Norrell leads a revival of practical magic in England and ignites a fierce rivalry with bold young conjurer Strange.

Ken Burns.title: Ken Burns: The Civil War
Ken Burns.description: Ken Burns's documentary depicts the action of famous Civil War battles, and relates the stories of soldiers, generals and a beleaguered president.

Ken Burns.title: Ken Burns: The Roosevelts: An Intimate History
Ken Burns.description: Award-winning documentarian Burns profiles three members of one of America's premier political families: Theodore, Franklin and Eleanor Roosevelt.

Steve Greenwood.title: Kingdoms of the Sky
Steve Greenwood.description: Meet the astonishing animals and adventurous people living on some of the most spectacular – and formidable – mountain ranges in the world.

Alejandro Lozano.title: La Viuda Negra
Alejandro Lozano.description: Beautiful and ruthless Griselda Blanco, known as the queen of cocaine, becomes Pablo Escobar's boss and governs a world of deceit and death.

Andrew Tan, Stephen Murray.title: Lego Friends: Girls on a Mission
Andrew Tan, Stephen Murray.description: Five best friends put their teamwork, wits and courage to the test when they take on a mission to protect Heartlake City from bad people.

Onur \u00dcnl\u00fc.title: Leyla and Mecnun
Onur \u00dcnl\u00fc.description: Destiny brings Mecnun and Leyla together as newborns, and again years later. Despite unexpected turns in Mecnun's zany life, Leyla remains a constant.

Jakob Verbruggen.title: London Spy
Jakob Verbruggen.description: When his reclusive-banker lover disappears, a hard-partying young British hedonist plunges into the dangerous world of espionage to find the truth.

Alessandro Angulo.title: Los tiempos de Pablo Escobar
Alessandro Angulo.description: Featuring never-before-seen images, personal testimonies and more, this is the story of one of the most notorious drug smugglers of all time.

Everardo Gout.title: Mars
Everardo Gout.description: Fact meets fiction in this docudrama chronicling the journey of a spacecraft crew as it embarks in 2033 on a mission to colonize the red planet.

Rachel Bell.title: Monty Don's French Gardens
Rachel Bell.description: TV personality Monty Don visits France’s most famous gardens to dig up the influence of power, culture and passion on their conceptions and designs.

Oliver Stone.title: Oliver Stone's Untold History of the United States
Oliver Stone.description: This documentary series offers an alternative take on modern American history, focusing on underreported events that shaped the nation's character.

Peter McDonnell.title: Origins Collection
Peter McDonnell.description: This documentary series explores the stories behind history's most fascinating innovations, including games, technology, sports, medicine and more.

Oscar Micheaux, Spencer Williams, Richar.title: Pioneers of African-American Cinema
Oscar Micheaux, Spencer Williams, Richar.description: This newly preserved collection features more than 20 films made by groundbreaking African American directors for black audiences from 1915 to 1946.

Bhavik Thakore.title: Prince Jai Aur Dumdaar Viru
Bhavik Thakore.description: A prince and a commoner who are best friends keep having to thwart the plots of the prince's scheming, ambitious minister.

Jani Lachauer, Jakob Schuh.title: Revolting Rhymes
Jani Lachauer, Jakob Schuh.description: Popular fairy tales take on a darkly comic edge in these short animated films based on a book by Roald Dahl and illustrator Quentin Blake.

Jay Chandrasekhar.title: Royal Pains
Jay Chandrasekhar.description: Dr. Hank Lawson unexpectedly gets a career upgrade as a freelance physician treating New York's aristocratic upper crust in their posh Hamptons homes.

Ehtesham Uddin.title: Sadqay Tumhare
Ehtesham Uddin.description: An arranged engagement between a village girl and her city cousin shows signs of true love, but an indiscretion decades ago could doom their romance.

Dheeraj Berry.title: Th Eena Meena Deeka Chase Comedy Show
Dheeraj Berry.description: A hungry fox and three resourceful, surprisingly formidable birds turn the animal kingdom on its head in this lively animated series.

Estela Renner.title: The Beginning of Life: The Series
Estela Renner.description: Using breakthroughs in technology and neuroscience, this series examines how environment affects infants – and how infants can affect our future.

Bumpy.title: The Calling
Bumpy.description: Food-crazed travel junkies journey across India, completing bucket list challenges for a chance to win a once-in-a-lifetime scholarship.

Michael Samuels.title: The Fear
Michael Samuels.description: Richie Beckett is an aging Brighton crime boss who's struggling with the onset of dementia, just as a rival gang is trying to take over his territory.

Mark Tonderai.title: The Five
Mark Tonderai.description: Twenty years after 5-year-old Jesse disappears near his home, his DNA turns up at the scene of a woman's murder, baffling his family and the police.

Ken Burns, Lynn Novick.title: The Vietnam War: A Film by Ken Burns and Lynn Novick
Ken Burns, Lynn Novick.description: Ken Burns presents an epic 10-part, 18-hour chronicle of the Vietnam War, featuring the soldiers, protesters, politicians and families that lived it.

Michael Cumming.title: Toast of London
Michael Cumming.description: After a divorce and fatal career move, a classically trained British stage actor navigates single life with his odd roommate and takes on horrid jobs.
